title: Bug 11306 - New class wizard launches simple project wizard
description: Since there are no existing projects, the dialog prompts the user to create a new project. This is very handy.
OB: When in a new workspace, in the Java perspective, press the 'New Class' button.
EB: When in a new workspace and in the Java perspective, pressing the 'New Class' button launches the simple project wizard.
SR: The 'New Class' button should launch the new class wizard instead of the simple project wizard in a new workspace and Java perspective.
